document.discussion_title: Up to 250 US military personnel headed to Syria, Obama administration officials say
document.topic_text: Fox News Monday 25th April, 2016 AERZEN, Germany – President Barack Obama will send an additional 250 military personnel to Syria to help local forces fighting the Islamic State group, increasing to 300 the number of U.S. forces battling extremists in the war-torn country, administration officials confirmed Sunday. Obama was expected to announce his decision Monday during a speech in Hannover, Germany, at the close of a weeklong trip, where IS was a focus of his meetings with world leaders in Saudi Arabia, Great Britain and Germany. The move will significantly increase the U.S. presence in Syria and comes a week a...
